source_note: State baseline derived from New Mexico Environment Department (NMED) and local solid waste programs; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting of yard and food waste permitted under NMED Solid Waste rules; encouraged statewide but not mandated.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste bin or compost drop-off where available.
organics.notes: Curbside composting limited to certain municipalities.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper, cardboard, and cartons.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.
paper_cardboard.notes: Greasy or wet paper not accepted.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Glass-only bin or drop-off (varies by city).
glass_containers.notes: Broken or non-container glass not accepted.
provenance: City of Santa Fe recycling info

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel cans; empty and rinse.
metal_containers.notes: No large scrap metal or aerosol cans.

plastics.guidance: Recycle plastic bottles and jugs labeled #1â€“#2; some areas accept #5.
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and Styrofoam not accepted curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: No statewide deposit or refund system for beverage containers.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle with curbside bin if accepted locally.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through drop-off sites or HHW collection events.
household_batteries.bin: Hazardous waste or battery collection site.
household_batteries.notes: Do not dispose of in trash or blue bin.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics recycling available through local drop-offs or collection events; not mandated statewide.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste recycler or event.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary; check local listings.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted in curbside recycling.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to store drop-off if available.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Albuquerque and Santa Fe have single-use plastic bag bans.
provenance: City of Albuquerque Clean & Green Ordinance

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulky item pickup or deliver to collection center.
bulky_items.notes: Fees or proof of residency may be required.
provenance: Santa Fe County solid waste division
